name: The Haunt Begins (PenguinTree)
description:
As a newly deceased paranormal investigator, it is now up to you to prevent a second untimely demise by shutting down your rogue ghost hunting equipment. After being short circuited, your world renown “Ghost Succ B.O.I. 9000”s are patrolling your library and blocking your escape. Luckily there is an emergency fail safe switch located in the next room, and you need to get past the machines in order to shut them down and continue your new ghost life.

Game by: Cristian Espinoza, Colin Hayes, Kevin Le, Adam Leibowich, and Heather Miller
